comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Resolving as Fixed. The jackrabbit-standalone project is now in a relatively good shape and included also in the 1.5 branch.

This gives us the following "quick start" bundles for all three deployment models:

    * model 1: jackrabbit-core
    * model 2: jackrabbit-webapp
    * model 3: jackrabbit-standalone

description:
Please create "quick start" developer bundles for deployment models 1,2,3 with all dependance libs and application startup code. Some kind of "Hello, world" app on models 1,2,3.
Tomcat and jetty bundles would be nice.
summary: Create "quick start" developer bundles for model 1,2,3 deployment
